name: Real Army Bus Transport
description:
Are you ready for the transport the Army soldiers and drive bus on off-road track and stay away from mine bombs, If you want to do this job, so you are very lucky, because it’s very Important and responsible duty for all bus drives to drope soldiers safely on border camp. Your job is That You Pick the militant solider from the army squad and drop them in war zone because there is very critical and dangerous situation, there might be possible war has begun in city. You got American 3d bus from the army camp base and pick the military officer and solider and go from the off-road up-hill 3d mountain and drop the war zone and you see the bomb on the road for the safety from the enemies, so be careful Drive.
You have driven many off-road vehicles, 4x4 jeep, Prado, and cargo truck etc but I know you never drive loaded bus on off road and impossible tracks. So this is lucky chance for you to show your master driving skills. Real Army Bus Transport is very amazing and attractive simulation game for all ages. Army game is very thrilling and realistic bus game. In this army, driver game we uses 3D graphics and real off-road Environments and smooth control. If you know about the driving you can show your driving skills in this army transporter game on the up-hill climb road.
Real Army Bus Transport, start your Russian army soldier duty in this transporter bus driver game your main mission is that you pick the military soldiers from army camp base and drop the dangerous and war zone on the mountain because the terrorist attacked on the army, and there is need the backup for the army attack on the terrorist and save the mountain area, civilians and our soldiers. Drive be carefully because bomb adjusted on the roads and edges of the turn. If you wrongly drive the army bus on the bomb, you will lose the job and blast the 4x4 army bus and kill all soldiers.
How to play Real Army Bus Transport

First of all you get the bus from army united states bus parking, and go the army camp, pick the soldiers different check post of army and drop the soldiers on the point where the green sing board. Up-hill 3D Mountain roads are very dangerous and curve and blasting point. You will complete the mission within given time; otherwise you will kill all army. Every Level is very Difficult and challenging level.

Feature of Real Army Bus Transport

Thrilling game play mission
Drive in Battle Field
Soldiers need the help of fast transportation, so you will reach the soldiers with your driving skills.
Mountain Environment
Follow the time frame
Realistic 3D Graphics
Soft and smooth Control
Difficult roads and curve turn
Army character animation
Offline Game Play
No Compulsory the registration
Challenging Levels
Time Lap Levels
Perform your duty as a army bus driver
